name: web-assitant
description: A web assistant to add custom buttons to execute custom scripts.

scripts.build: (webpack --config production.config.js | tee -a logs/build-production_`date +%Y-%m-%d`.txt) && printf '\n' && cp -v dist/*.js extensions/chrome/
scripts.build-development: (webpack --config development.config.js | tee -a logs/build-development_`date +%Y-%m-%d`.txt) && printf '\n' && cp -v dist/*.js extensions/chrome/
scripts.test: echo 'Error: no test specified yet!' && exit 1

author: Fisher
